name: PureTech Systems
tag_list: camera-auto-tracking, outdoor-intelligent-video, video-perimeter-surveillance, video-analytics, thermal-video-analytics, intelligent-video, real-object-size, scan-to-target, slew-to-cue, object-tracking, geoint, geospatial
overview:
PureTech Systems is a leading-edge developer of advanced wide-area video surveillance and perimeter intrusion detection systems designed to help protect critical infrastructure and lives at airports, seaports, subways, utilities and other facilities with expansive or geographically distributed operations.

PureTec Systems is a leading provider of video analytics. Our PureActiv™ system addresses threats to safeguard lives, facilities, and high-value assets. It provides real-time video alarms of suspicious activity in outdoor environments while minimizing nuisance alarms. Features include innovative geospatial GUI, advanced object detection/tracking, automated camera steering, video management, and automated security response.
